description: Adds a cooldown to an entity. The intention of this cooldown is to be used to prevent the entity from attempting to acquire new attack targets.

fields.description: Event to be run when the cooldown is complete.
fields.title: Attack Cooldown Complete Event

fields.description: Amount of time in seconds for the cooldown. Can be specified as a number or a pair of numbers (min and max).
fields.title: Attack Cooldown Time

title: Attack Cooldown
